replies.body: Is that a fucking void fidget spinner
vel'koz gets bored
He also needs something to focus on when he isn't staring the enemy team into oblivion - apart from not getting ganked.
He focuses on on analyzing poros of course.

I heard he had a phase where he was very.. engrossed with something. Can't quite remember what though

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Let's just say it's something we want to leave behind us.

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
He tries to replicate lifeform entertainment routine!

> [{quoted}](name=DyQuill,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4G2FRh7I,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-02-22T03:42:43.528+0000)
>
> vel'koz gets bored

That tends to happen when you're alone in your body.
Void indeed is a twisted place

Humanity is weirder.
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=WFKndYv3DXU

Spidget Finners...
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Ah, the official League fidget spinner.

That is not dead which can eternal lie
And with strange aeons even death may die.

https://twitter.com/draggles/status/966409508883873793

This tweet is relevant.
And a coloured one at that. Now I am anticipating the coloured crest to appear on the Universe page with its update.
Void LU incoming? {{champion:161}}
Now I want Void sivir using a boomerang shaped like the void crest.
How do you get it?

purple void stuff = 3
3 = points of a triangle 
triangle (is twisted but its still there) = Illuminati
void Illuminati confirmed
I would love if riot did a sweet summoner icon like this one every time a new champ comes out.
Y E E E E E E E E S S S S S

It looks like Vel’Koz...
and Ka’Sai’s facial markings...

Looks like a Void fidget spinner.

LOL Please make this, I would buy tons of these @Riot Games
